title: [1.16]更新至20w17a-b1 前沿科技整合包
author: thx114
txt_content:
本帖最后由 thx114 于 2020-4-29 20:19 编辑 

1.16前沿模组整合20w17a-b1版本
前言几乎整合了1.16所有（能用）的mod包括了一些开发中的

更新内容

20w17a-b1（2020/4/29）
   -1.整合包发布

内容介绍


共55个模组（游戏内显示60个）
包含了：

[元素时代]Element Era 元素时代 (开发中)[简单抽屉]Simple Drawers (by benfah)[大气声音]Atmosfera (by HephaestusDev)[快照想法]Snapshot Ideas (by benfah)[右键收获]MaxVar reap (by maxvar_ru)[科技复兴]Tech Reborn (by modmuss50)[融合台阶]Fabric Vertical Slabs (by Motschen)[垂直台阶]Mixed Slab (by dainxt)[光照优化]Phosphor (Fabric) (by jellysquid_)[更多背景音乐]Infinite Music (by frinn38)[配置更新]Auto Config Updated API (by shedaniel)[更多附魔]More Enchantments (by biom4st3r1)[锯木机]Corail Woodcutter (by Corail_31)[真实脚步]Presence Footsteps (by S0llace)[鼠标手势]Mouse Wheelie (Fabric) (by Siphalor)[更多生物群系]Ecotones (by SuperCoder79)[红石导管]RSWires (by 2xsaiko)[更多们]ExtraDoors (by ExtraCrafTX)[mod列表]Mod Menu (Fabric) (by ProspectorDev)[指令补全]pathsuggestion (by liachmodded)[亮度显示]Light Overlay (Rift/Forge/Fabric) (by shedaniel)[寻找物品]Where Is It (by JackFred2)[更多药水]Extra Alchemy (by zabi94)[原版锤子]Vanilla Hammers (by Draylar1)[坚固的蛋糕]Persistent Cake (by HeckinChloe)[更多苹果]AppleZ (by Globox_Z)[键位冲突]Amecs (Fabric) (by Siphalor)[更多方块]Blockus (by Brandcraft_)[小地图]Just Map (by Bulldoq83)[挖矿指环]Ring of the Miner [FABRIC] (by kwpugh)[REI物品管理器]Roughly Enough Items (REI) (by shedaniel)[更多工作站]Improved Stations (Fabric) (by shedaniel)[修复幽灵方块]AntiGhost (by thorgeig)[测距]BlockMeterFabric (by thorgeig)[一键砍树]benfah's Timber Mod (by benfah)[耐久HUD]Giselbaer's Durability Viewer (by thorgeig)[怪物蛋标签]Egg Tab (by florensie)[苹果皮]AppleSkin (by squeek502)[潜影盒显示]ShulkerBoxTooltip (by misterpemodder)[更好的地狱]BetterNether (by paulevs)[高级末影之眼]Greater Eye of Ender[FABRIC] (by kwpugh)[末影箱之戒]Ring of the Enderchest[FABRIC] (by kwpugh)[崩溃原因显示]Not Enough Crashes (by NatanFudge)[截图到剪切板]Screenshot to Clipboard (Fabric) (by comp500)[迷你hud]minihud[隐藏方块]SecretRoomsMod by AbrarSyed[万能工具箱]tweakeroo[前置]LibGui[前置]Fabric Language Kotlin (by NikkyAI)[前置]Fabric API (by asiekierka)[前置]Cloth Config API (Fabric) (by shedaniel)[前置]Reborn Core (by modmuss50)[前置]items croller[前置]litematica[前置]malilib






配置需求最低要求推荐配置4GB内存8GB奔腾-G4560 / e3I3,7代/或同级别处理器
推荐[openj9 java 8]以提高帧数并降低内存占用[openj9 java在分配大于系统剩余内存的情况下会报错]
下载地址【百度网盘】提取码：rlsn【诚通网盘】
